name: Hentai - Jail DLC
detailed_description:
This DLC adds a new game mode, with a new intro, graphics, music and ending.


Try to collect all the mushrooms to complete the game in a big map with different paths to take, can you escape prison and free Hentai?
Different types of enemies try to stop you though!

Press Z to jump, press Z twice to double jump, hold Z longer to make a longer jump.
Arrow keys to move, press space to respawn at the last checkpoint.

To play this DLC click on the Prison logo in the right under corner of the main menu screen.

short_description:
This DLC adds a new game mode, with a new intro, graphics and ending.

Try to collect all the mushrooms to escape jail!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Pentium IV 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 10 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9-compatible graphics adapter with 128 MB
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®9-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Pentium IV 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9-compatible graphics adapter with 128 MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®9-compatible
